name: Lil Chicks
description:
Look at chicks walking around, eating and laying eggs. you can also name them but don't get too attached, if they don't find food they'll starve and die! :(

There are also carrots, trees, flowers, mushrooms and grass that grow and spread.

Controls:
-A,D or <, > arrow keys = Rotate camera.
-Mouse click on a Chick =  See chicks name, health and food. click on the name to change it.
-Mouse click on Ground = 5% chance to spawn food or a random object.

Mushroom effects:
Brown = +1 food.
Purple = +1 health.
Red = 50% chance for -1 food.

I hope you enjoy it at least for 1 minute. :)
